name: happy-hour-too-many-tires
title: Happy Hour: Too Many Tires
author: Christy Frink
excerpt: Is it that time of year again? The CMA nominations were announced today and Kenny I Hate Fan Voting Chesney leads the back with 7 nominations this year.
contentEncoded:
• Is it that time of year again? The CMA nominations were announced today and Kenny “I Hate Fan Voting” Chesney leads the back with 7 nominations this year. As long as it’s not John Rich. [WTVF]
  • We’d almost forgotten about those failed buyout offers that the state threw out to its employees in hopes of bailing us out of some serious financial trouble. They’re so bad that even the 80-year olds aren’t having it. [Tennessean]
  • Why do so many kids have brass knuckles (and box cutters… and knives… and guns)? We’re taking them away. Kids these days. [WSMV]
  • Bridgestone Americas is feeling the heat from the economy these days too. They’re being forced to reduce production through the end of the year, cutting over 20 days of work at both the LaVergne and Warren County plants. [Nashville Business Journal]
Photo by Idiolector.
